mainBlock.claim: Get, collect and play with the pets you've always wanted.

worldBlock.title: Discover a new World
worldBlock.text: Purchase your favourite pets and collect them all or participate in community activities to win BAMBOO.
worldBlock.explanation: * BAMBOO is the game governance token belonging to the Bamboo DeFi ecosystem.

bambooBlock.title: What is Bamboo?
bambooBlock.text1: BAMBOO is the governance token (in-game currency) belonging to the Bamboo DeFi ecosystem.
bambooBlock.text2: You will use it to get your pets, play games and participate in tournaments, and you will also be rewarded in BAMBOO!

petsBlock.title: Pets
petsBlock.text1: What stage of growth do you want your pet to be at?

descriptions.birds: Fast, observant and very passionate about what they do, do you have your favourite yet?
descriptions.canids: Canids sniff out your love for them and use their strength to offer you the best protection in the world.
descriptions.felines: Felines are very independent, able to see in the dark and run long distances. Purrrrrr!
descriptions.primates: This animal species has an energetic attitude and a heart-stopping flexibility - get to know them (if they're not lazing around)!
descriptions.ursids: Quiet, independent and very loving, these animals will captivate you instantly. By the way, they need a lot of rest in winter!

randomizationBlock.title: Randomization
randomizationBlock.text: In Hashapon, pets are totally free to be whatever they want to be. They will randomly decide the shape of their arms, legs, body or head.

statsBlock.title: Stats
statsBlock.text: Train the stats of your pets to get the best results in tournaments. Play them and win prizes!
statsBlock.textBold: More ways to increase your stats?

explanations.endurance: Develop your pet's endurance to withstand the toughest challenges.
explanations.flexibility: A flexible pet is a pet that coordinates better - improve its agility with this stat!
explanations.speed: Ready, steady, go! Train your speed to compete and be lighter than your teammates.
explanations.strength: Did someone say strength? Exercise this skill and stand out by winning tournaments.

locationsBlock.title: Where will your pets grow up?

incubators.name: Incubator
incubators.description: The hatchery welcomes all the eggs you have decided to hatch. Which pet will it hide?

playground.name: Playground
playground.description: Play with his friends and get him ready for school. Your pet will get sand all over himself, but he'll learn to behave!

school.name: School
school.description: Here your beloved animal will learn the best lessons in life - you'll have to take it to the exam to graduate!

gym.name: Gym
gym.description: The gym has a reduced registration fee for your pets to improve their strength, endurance, speed and flexibility.

others.name: Other scenarios
others.description: You still have to discover the wonderful Hashapon Paradise and other scenarios that we will open when they are discovered.

seasonsBlock.title: Seasons
seasonsBlock.subtitle: Actual season
seasonsBlock.description: Get to know new collections of mascots or participate in different tournaments with each season.

tournaments.title: Tournaments
tournaments.text1: Use your pets' stats to participate in the fantastic tournaments each season.
tournaments.text2: Will he have trained hard enough and will he beat his teammates?
tournaments.text3: Reach the highest positions and collect the best prizes - get BAMBOO, tickets and other prizes!
